comments.body: Somewhere we should check that `ConcurrentStatefulSetSyncs` `> 0` or `>= 0` (not sure which), but I'm guessing this Validate is really just for flags and I'd expect to see it on StatefulSetControllerConfiguration
@justinsb  Thank you for your suggestion, I have updated codes here to check that `ConcurrentStatefulSetSyncs > 0`.
